products: Experience smooth, immersive gaming with the LG UltraGear 27-inch Gaming Monitor. It features a high refresh rate, ultra-fast response time, and NVIDIA G-SYNC compatibility for tear-free gameplay.
Bake like a pro with the KitchenAid Stand Mixer. It features a powerful motor, 10-speed settings, and a range of attachments for mixing, kneading, and whipping.

Cook delicious meals quickly and easily with the Instant Pot Duo Pressure Cooker. It features 7 cooking functions, including pressure cooking, slow cooking, and steaming, for versatile meal preparation.

The iPhone 14 display has rounded corners that follow a beautiful curved design, and these corners are within a standard rectangle. When measured as a standard rectangular shape, the screen is 15.40 centimetres (6.06) diagonally.
